DialogTextUnknownNPCDay0D.comment: catch-all if npc00 is somehow referenced
DialogTextUnknownNPCDay0D.text: If you see this then I really messed up.

DialogTextCarlDay00.comment: Carl is talking to a customer on day00
DialogTextCarlDay00.text: Sorry, I'll be with you next.

DialogTextCarlDay02.comment: Carl is talking to a customer on day02
DialogTextCarlDay02.text: Sorry, it might be a while.

DialogTextFrankDay00.comment: hanging around the mall in the AM

DialogTextFrankDay08.comment: hanging around the mall in the AM

DialogTextLisaDay00.text: It's way too slow here tonight.

DialogTextLisaDay01.text: I hope your store is doing better than us.

DialogTextLisaDay02.comment: only dialog is in scripted events this day

DialogTextGrunbergDay00.text: Let me know if you need anything.

DialogTextGrunbergDay02.text: What an odd thing to ask about.|Someone is worrying too much.

DialogTextJenDay00.text: You must be new here.^|Please stop by when you're on break.

DialogTextJenDay01.text: Sorry, have to do inventory.^|Let's hang out another night.

DialogTextJenDay02.text: Oh my, what is she looking for?

DialogTextGriffyDay00.text: Uh, I think we're, what's it called?|All out of that.

DialogTextScottDay00.text: We still sell 8-track players.|Won't find them anywhere else in 1990.

DialogTextToddDay00.text: You must be the new one Lisa mentioned.

DialogTextToddDay01.text: I don't need any help tonight.^|Thanks for checking though.

DialogTextToddDay02.text: Lisa talked to me last night.^|Wish I could help.

DialogTextElizaDay00.text: Sorry, nothing new came in today.^|At least nothing good.

DialogTextElizaDay01.text: Just give me a little more time.^|I'll figure you out.

DialogTextElizaDay02.text: That's all I have for you.

DialogTextBeckyDay00.text: Is this your first day?.^|That is so exciting!

DialogTextRandyDay00.text: The new camping guy is alright.^|He likes the outdoors as much as me.

DialogTextRandyDay01.text: Happy to talk, but not tonight.

DialogTextRandyDay02.text: No, but that is a weird thing to ask.

DialogTextGuardDay01.text: I don't know what he's up to.

DialogTextGuardDay02.text: Anything I saw is private mall security info.

DialogTextBillyDay00.text: What? He said I could wait here.

DialogTextBillyDay04.comment: in the camping section this day
DialogTextBillyDay04.text: Will he let me take a nap here?

DialogTextBillyDay06.comment: in the fishing section this day
DialogTextBillyDay06.text: Do you know how these work?

DialogTextBillyDay08.text: I'm not allowed to watch this one.

DialogTextThomasDay02.comment: Why are you asking me this?

DialogTextHeatherDay00.text: I really like the new camping guy.^|I learned a ton from him already.

DialogTextGrantDay00.text: I don't know if you remember me.^|I was friends with your parents.^|Don't be a stranger.

DialogTextGrantDay01.text: Thanks for the help last week.

DialogTextNickyDay02.text: I haven't been here that long.^|I don't know what's even normal.

DialogTextTanyaDay01.text: This thing takes forever to finish.

DialogTextCraigDay00.text: I didn't think anyone would find me.

DialogTextCraigDay02.text: I barely see anything back here.

DialogTextJuanDay00.text: Poor kid is stuck here all day.

DialogTextJuanDay02.text: Nope, just a regular day here.

DialogTextLauraDay00.text: Most people just like to look.

DialogTextLauraDay01.text: We had some odd types today.

DialogTextGinaDay02.text: We get all types asking questions.^|You'll have to be more specific.

DialogTextSantaDay00.text: It's OK, any age can visit Santa.

DialogTextSantaDay02.text: This Santa doesn't keep a naughty list.

DialogTextLostGuyDay00.comment: in the fishing section this day
DialogTextLostGuyDay00.text: Do these work on land too?

DialogTextLostGuyDay06.comment: in the appliances section this day

DialogTextLostGuyDay0C.comment: in the audio section this day

DialogTextRockerDay00.comment: in story event, no other dialog

DialogTextRockerDay0C.comment: at the info desk this day

DialogTextShopperDay00.comment: in the record store this day
DialogTextShopperDay00.text: I don't know if this is worth $15

DialogTextShopperDay02.text: I know this place is bad.^|I wish there was another option.

DialogTextShopperDay0A.comment: at the appliances section this day

DialogTextBusyMomDay00.comment: in story event, no other dialog

DialogTextBusyMomDay04.comment: in the appliances section this day

DialogTextBusyMomDay06.text: Where can I find normal clothes?

DialogTextBusyMomDay08.comment: in the tv section this day

DialogTextBusyMomDay0A.comment: at the fishing section this day

DialogTextBusyMomDay0C.text: I can't believe it only came^|with a single controller.

DialogTextMallratDay02.text: This isn't really my thing..^|but it's so popular right now.

DialogTextMallratDay04.comment: in the audio section this day
DialogTextMallratDay04.text: Do you work here?^|That guy isn't much help.

DialogTextMallratDay06.text: Is this based on the music video?

DialogTextMallratDay08.text: I like all the new dress colors.

DialogTextMallratDay0A.comment: used in story event this day

DialogTextMallratDay0C.text: After xmas is the best time to shop.

DialogTextPreppyDay00.text: There's no way you work here.

DialogTextPreppyDay02.text: I wonder if they have it...

DialogTextPreppyDay0A.comment: used in story event - no other dialog

DialogTextPreppyDay0C.text: I've never been to this part of the mall.

DialogTextYuppieDay00.comment: in the appliances section this day
DialogTextYuppieDay00.text: An ice maker would be nice.^|It would save me hours.

DialogTextYuppieDay02.comment: in the audio section this day
DialogTextYuppieDay02.text: I wanted something with a more modern look.

DialogTextYuppieDay04.text: These look comfortable.^|But the color is atrocious.

DialogTextYuppieDay06.comment: in the south hall this day

DialogTextYuppieDay08.text: I don't think he'd wear this.

DialogTextYuppieDay0A.text: Hmm, any good last minute gifts..

DialogTextYuppieDay0C.text: This is the one I was looking for.

DialogTextNelsonDay0D.text: Don't worry about me.^|I can handle closing solo.

DialogTextHiddenHJDay0C.text: It's too bad, I have all of these already.|It was still worth the visit though.

DialogTextHiddenMJDay0C.text: I came all the way here & still can't|find the Kathleen|Sunfire book.
